about.summary: A package to perform particle segmentation and analysis

name: particlespy
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "particlespy" %}
{% set version = "0.2.0" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: dab97ed33845b16963fa210907d4bd6cdb488f02d9a50cc04388e3e3c715de0c

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python >=3
    - setuptools
  run:
    - hyperspy
    - pyqt
    - python >=3
    - scikit-image >=0.15

test:
  imports:
    - ParticleSpy

about:
  home: https://github.com/ePSIC-DLS/ParticleSpy
  license: GPL-3.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: "A package to perform particle segmentation and analysis"
  doc_url: https://epsic-dls.github.io/ParticleSpy/index.html

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - tschoonj
